page.title: 16CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: In East REading there are so many different games played. Some of the games played are{HE}or{BALL HE. HE} is a game of{TIG. }The boys down East Reading all meet at one place. Then they dip up for HE and whoever is HE they give their mates a chance to run away and then they chase them. When the one who is HE catches anybody the person who is caught has to be HE with him. When everbody is caught the first one caught will be HE.{Dip up}means when everyone is included and the last one out is HE. {BALL HE}is played with a ball. The ball has to hit the person below the waist. Then when you are close to the person you are not allowed to throw the ball hard. The other games played are football, cricket and Hide and Seek. By M.Din Alfred Sutton Boys School
